statements: SELECT * FROM user_interactions WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT interaction_type, interaction_timestamp FROM user_interactions WHERE preference_option = 'like';
SELECT user_id, interaction_details FROM user_interactions WHERE interaction_timestamp > '2022-01-01 00:00:00';
SELECT * FROM user_interactions WHERE user_id = 2 ORDER BY interaction_timestamp DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT preference_option FROM user_interactions ORDER BY preference_option ASC;
SELECT * FROM user_interactions WHERE user_id = 1 ORDER BY interaction_timestamp DESC;
SELECT user_id, interaction_type, preference_option FROM user_interactions WHERE preference_option = 'like' AND interaction_type = 'click' ORDER BY interaction_timestamp ASC;

SELECT user_id, interaction_timestamp, JSON_VALUE(interaction_details, '$.location') AS location FROM user_interactions WHERE JSON_VALUE(interaction_details, '$.device') = 'mobile' ORDER BY interaction_timestamp DESC;
SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT user_id) AS unique_users, interaction_type FROM user_interactions GROUP BY interaction_type;
SELECT user_id, interaction_type, CAST(interaction_timestamp AS DATE) AS interaction_date FROM user_interactions WHERE interaction_date = '2022-09-15';
SELECT user_id, interaction_type, interaction_timestamp FROM UserInteractions;
SELECT interaction_type, user_id, interaction_timestamp FROM UserInteractions;
SELECT interaction_timestamp, user_id, interaction_type FROM UserInteractions;
SELECT user_id, temperature_preference, lighting_preference FROM UserPreferences;
SELECT temperature_preference, user_id, lighting_preference FROM UserPreferences;
SELECT user_id, interaction_type, interaction_timestamp FROM UserInteractions WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM UserInteractions WHERE interaction_type = 'click' ORDER BY interaction_timestamp DESC;
SELECT user_id, temperature_preference, lighting_preference FROM UserPreferences WHERE temperature_preference > 25;
SELECT user_id, interaction_type FROM UserInteractions WHERE interaction_timestamp > '2022-01-01 00:00:00' ORDER BY interaction_timestamp ASC;
SELECT user_id, MAX(temperature_preference) AS max_temperature_preference FROM UserPreferences GROUP BY user_id;
SELECT user_id, interaction_time, interaction_type FROM UserInteractions;
SELECT user_id, preference_type, preference_value FROM UserPreferences;
SELECT device_id, device_name, device_type FROM SmartHomeDevices;
SELECT device_id, device_name, device_type, room_id FROM SmartHomeDevices ORDER BY room_id DESC;
SELECT user_id, interaction_time, interaction_type FROM UserInteractions WHERE interaction_type = 'click';
SELECT user_id, interaction_time, interaction_type FROM UserInteractions;
SELECT user_id, preference_type, preference_value FROM UserPreferences;
SELECT device_id, device_name, device_type, room_id, user_id FROM SmartHomeDevices ORDER BY device_id DESC;
SELECT user_id, interaction_time, interaction_type FROM UserInteractions WHERE user_id = 123;
SELECT device_id, device_name, device_type, room_id, user_id FROM SmartHomeDevices WHERE room_id = 456 ORDER BY device_name;
SELECT * FROM UserInteractions;
SELECT user_id, interaction_type FROM UserInteractions ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT device_type, room_id FROM SmartDevices WHERE device_type = 'Thermostat';
SELECT user_id, preference_value FROM UserPreferences WHERE preference_type = 'Language';
SELECT device_id, room_id, device_type FROM SmartDevices JOIN RoomPreferences ON SmartDevices.room_id = RoomPreferences.room_id;
SELECT user_id, interaction_type, timestamp FROM UserInteractions
SELECT user_id, preference_type, preference_value FROM UserPreferences ORDER BY user_id DESC
SELECT device_id, device_type, room_id FROM SmartDevices WHERE device_type = 'Smart Thermostat'
SELECT room_id, temperature, lighting_level FROM RoomPreferences WHERE temperature > 25
SELECT * FROM UserInteractions JOIN UserPreferences ON UserInteractions.user_id = UserPreferences.user_id
SELECT * FROM user_profiles;
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM user_profiles ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT user_id, username, email, gender FROM user_profiles WHERE age > 30;
SELECT user_id, username, email, age, gender FROM user_profiles WHERE gender = 'Female';
SELECT user_id, username, email, age, gender FROM user_profiles WHERE age BETWEEN 20 AND 40;
SELECT * FROM user_profiles WHERE age > 30 ORDER BY username ASC;
SELECT user_id, email, gender FROM user_profiles WHERE gender = 'female' AND age BETWEEN 20 AND 40;
SELECT user_profiles.*, user_preferences.home_theme FROM user_profiles JOIN user_preferences ON user_profiles.user_id = user_preferences.user_id WHERE notification_enabled = TRUE;
SELECT interactions_log.log_id, interactions_log.interaction_type, user_profiles.username FROM interactions_log LEFT JOIN user_profiles ON interactions_log.user_id = user_profiles.user_id;
SELECT devices.device_name, smart_home_settings.temperature_unit FROM devices FULL JOIN smart_home_settings ON devices.user_id = smart_home_settings.user_id WHERE devices.status = 'active';
